name: SCARLET SAILS- 7" vinyl record
description:
Snag our first 7" vinyl record featuring two tracks off our soon to be world famous hit record "Scarlet Sails". [Limited supply]

1.) Pow Wow 03:20
2.) City Girls 03:54


 - Credits - 

Jessica Louise Dye - vocals, guitar 
Erik Sleight - guitar, backing vocals, auxiliary 
Peter Larkin - bass, guitar, auxiliary 
Adam Orlando - drums, backing vocals 
Rick Irby - bass, backing vocals, auxiliary 
Ron Storhaug - trumpet / flugelhorn, backing vocals, auxiliary 

Recorded by Peter Larkin and Rick Irby 
Produced / Mixed by Peter Larkin 
Mastered by Kenneth Olden
tags

name: No More Bad Dreams, Please
description:
If you're like Jess, you hate sleeves too.  So we hand silk screened a hand drawn dream catcher on American Apparel organic tri-blend tank tops to catch all your nightmares. 

Petitie boys and girls should purchase a size down. If you normally wear a small, get an extra-small.

SIZES- extra small, small

name: Light as a Feather
description:
This is a unisex t-shirt that looks cute on boys and girls!  Hand silk screened ourselves (wow!) on American Apparel organic tri-blend t-shirts that are so comfy you will want to sleep in it.

Girls should purchase a size down, size small is really an extra-small.

SIZES- large

PS-  Thanks go out to our fan Marcus for modeling the shirt he bought at a recent show.

name: Spirit Wings
description:
This is a unisex t-shirt that will help you look more attractive to the opposite sex.  Guaranteed! Hand silk screened ourselves (wow!) on bright teal American Apparel organic t-shirts.  The v-neck gives this shirt some pizazz. 

Petitie boys and girls should purchase a size down. If you normally wear a small, get an extra-small.

SIZES- extra small, small, medium

PS- Thanks go out to our fan Beth Farnstrom for whipping up this owl drawing for us!
